ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION: I am currently retraining as a software developer and truly enjoy programming. I originally come from the automotive industry, where I especially liked troubleshooting and finding practical solutions. This structured way of thinking now helps me a lot in IT. I am learning new technologies step by step and enjoy continuously expanding my knowledge. If something doesn’t work right away, I stay persistent and keep working on it until I find a solution. I am highly motivated and look forward to growing both professionally and personally.

SKILLS.TITLE: MY SKILLS
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION-1: Don't see the skill your need?

PORTFOLIO.TITLE: Portfolio
PORTFOLIO.DESCRIPTION: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action
PORTFOLIO.1: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
PORTFOLIO.2: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on object-oriented approach. Help Elvoron to find coins and mana to fight against the Hellknight.
PORTFOLIO.3: Based on the PokéAPI a simple libary hat provides and catalogues pokemon information.
